name: RAKUGA FANTASY
description:
RAKUGA FANTASY is a 3D dungeon crawler where you'll find treasures and enemies of all shapes and sizes- the catch is that you must play fast-paced microgames to fight! Taking inspiration from games like Ayakashi no Shiro, Urusei Yatsura: Miss Tomobiki Wo Sagase!, Shin Megami Tensei, and WarioWare: Mega Microgame$!, you must fight your way up 3 floors of danger and mystery to defeat the evil WARLOCK and save the princess! Do you have what it takes?

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys- Move

Z- Confirm

Controls for each microgame can be found in the lower right corner of the screen when playing.

NOTE: When entering a new floor, the game may take some time to load. We apologize in advance for the load times.
